hero-slug: You can use our calorie calculator to learn your daily calorie and macro needs.
activity-item1: Sedentary (I don't exercise or exercise very little.)
activity-item2: Lightly active (Lightly active lifestyle / I exercise 1-3 days a week.)
activity-item3: Moderately active (Active lifestyle / I exercise 3-5 days a week.)
activity-item4: Very active (Very active lifestyle / I exercise 6-7 days a week.)
goal-item2: Gain weight (muscle mass increase, clean bulking)
goal-item3: Gain weight quickly (your fat percentage may increase, dirty bulking)
res-thanks: Thank you for using our app ❤️
